evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: Today we're going to talk about growth mindset.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: Growth mindset is the idea that you can get better at things through effort and practice.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: the main point is that effort matters.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: Growth mindset is the belief that abilities can be developed through dedication and hard work.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: The curriculum says I should tell you that effort matters more than talent.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: But with growth mindset, you can try again.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: , to summarize: growth mindset means you can improve.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: Sure. , if you're bad at something, instead of saying 'I'm bad at this,' you say 'I'm not good at th...

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: It's a muscle in that way.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: That's something you'd need to talk to a doctor about.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: Anyway, we should probably get back to growth mindset.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: Then try to reframe them more positively with a growth mindset perspective.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: the main points are: effort matters, you can improve through practice, and don't have a fixed minds...

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: Growth mindset is about believing you can develop your abilities.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: When things get hard, remember that you can improve with effort.

evaluation_ready_transcript.speaker: Fellow
evaluation_ready_transcript.text: We'll be moving on to a new topic, but you can always bring up questions about growth mindset if you...
